text.0: After President Buhari announced the approval of a new salary structure and retirement year for teachers, a message went viral on WhatsApp with the claim that the new salary will equal that of the police. That message is misleading. Read here:https://t.co/QIGEl1uw2h #DubawaChecks
text.1: The Nigerian Army stand by their denial of any involvement in the shooting of #EndSARS protesters at Lekki toll gate on the 20th of October, 2020. However, analysis of reports, pictures, and videos prove this to be false. Read here: https://t.co/Mc6PuYSBQx #DubawaChecks
